name: WishCare Hair Growth Serum Concentrate - Rosemary, 3% Redensyl, 4% Anagain, 2% Baicapil, Caffeine, Biotin, Plant Keratin & Rice Water
short_description: BOOSTS HAIR GROWTH - WishCare Hair Growth Serum is a concentrated formula specially designed to support hair health. Working to promote a thicker, denser, fuller and healthier-looking head of hair. It utilises a concentration of Redensyl, Anagain, Baicapil Caffeine, Biotin, Keratin & Rice Water.

REDUCE HAIRFALL - The patented pepetides along with natural-based extracts are specifically designed control hairfall at the root and prolong the life cycle of your hair. This helps in fully restoring hair vitality & density and works as great hair serum for hair growth.

LEAVE-ON FORMULA - The ultra-lightweight hair growth serum with a base of Rice Water has a leave-on texture for effective penetration and does not leave a greasy or oily residue on your hair and scalp.

SAFE & POWERFUL INGREDIENTS - Redensyl: Targets stem cells and human fibroblasts from the derma papilla to improve hair density, Anagain - An Organic Pea Sprout Extract to Rebalance the Hair Life Cycle, Baicapil : Increases the look of hair density.

CLEAN & NON-TOXIC: Cruelty free, paraben free, vegan, gluten free, fragrance free and non-toxic. Made with the highest-quality botanical, earth-based ingredients combined with non-toxic-to-skin alternatives and advanced science. Our top priority is to ensure our formulas are safe for your scalp and hair.

HOW TO USE - Use the micro-spray to apply the serum directly on the scalp and use your fingertips to massage the serum into the scalp. Leave it overnight for best results. Use it regularly every night over a 3 month period."

name: OGX Renewing + Argan Oil of Morocco Hair Oil, Extra Strength Penetrating Serum Treatment for Dry, Damaged, Frizzy, Curly & Coarse Hair, Cold-Pressed Argan Oil, Shine, 3.3 Fl Oz
short_description: Deep repair for damaged hair: This extra strength hair oil for damaged hair penetrates deeply to restore dry, brittle strands; Infused with cold-pressed Argan oil of Morocco for hair, it renews shine and softness for visibly healthy results

Frizz and curl control: Tame frizzy hair and define curls with this nourishing hair oil for frizzy hair and hair oil for curly hair; Delivers smooth, manageable texture and radiant shine for all hair types, including coarse and color-treated hair

Strengthen and revitalize: This hair oil and hair serum strengthens and revitalizes weak, over-processed hair; Formula infused with water-based silk proteins and pure argan oil help reduce breakage for strong hair

Pure, cold-pressed ingredients: Formula infused with pure, cold-pressed Argan oil of Morocco for hair, this hair treatment for dry damaged hair is free from parabens and sulfated surfactants; formula seals in moisture and nutrients for lasting softness

Shine and scent: Experience a luxurious hair serum with a citrus-fresh, floral-green, woody scent; Use daily for touchable, shiny hair and a complete hair care routine that leaves hair looking and feeling its best
product_description: OGX Renewing + Argan Oil of Morocco Extra Penetrating Hair Oil is an extra-hydrating hair oil treatment expertly formulated to moisturize and repair dry, damaged, frizzy, curly, coarse, thick, and color-treated hair. This 3.3 fl oz hair oil for damaged hair and hair oil for frizzy hair features a powerful blend of cold-pressed Argan oil of Morocco and water-based silk proteins that deeply penetrate the hair shaft, restoring softness, strength, and radiant shine. The formula is suitable for a range of hair types and free from harsh additives, including parabens and sulfated surfactants, making it ideal for hair that needs extra care. Formula infused with cold-pressed Argan oil of Morocco conditions strands, while water-based silk proteins help improve hair strength, leaving hair silky smooth, touchably soft, and visibly healthy. The multi-layered fragrance experience combines citrus-fresh, floral-green, and woody notes for a pleasant, lasting scent. This nourishing hair oil for curly hair and hair oil for thick hair also works as a hair moisturizer, helping to revive and renew hair’s natural luster, reduce dryness, and tame unruly texture. Designed for versatility, it supports hair that is prone to breakage, dullness, or color treatment stress, delivering results you can see and feel. For best results, pair with OGX Extra Strength Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo and Conditioner to create a complete hair care regimen that delivers visibly renewed, healthy, and radiant hair. Beauty pure and simple, this extra-hydrating hair oil treatment is your solution for touchably soft, strong, and shiny hair every day.
